kfb.name: Knit Front & Back
kfb.description: Knit into the front then back of the same stitch.

BO1.name: Bind Off 1
BO1.description: Knit 2 stitches, then slip the first stitch over the second stitch.

MB3.name: Make Bobble 3
MB3.description: Into one stitch: (Knit, YO) 1 time, then knit again (3 sts total). Turn, p3. Turn, k3. To finish, pass the second stitch on the right needle over the first stitch 2 times.

MB5.name: Make Bobble 5
MB5.description: Into one stitch: (Knit, YO) 2 times, then knit again (5 sts total). Turn, p5. Turn, k5. Repeat the last two rows 1 more time. To finish, pass the second stitch on the right needle over the first stitch 4 times.

MB7.name: Make Bobble 7
MB7.description: Into one stitch: (Knit, YO) 3 times, then knit again (7 sts total). Turn, p7. Turn, k7. Repeat the last two rows 1 more time. To finish, pass the second stitch on the right needle over the first stitch 6 times.

MB9.name: Make Bobble 9
MB9.description: Into one stitch: (Knit, YO) 4 times, then knit again (9 sts total). Turn, p9. Turn, k9. Repeat the last two rows 2 more times. To finish, pass the second stitch on the right needle over the first stitch 8 times.
